channel.title: Need coder!
channel.description: I am currently making my first server. I am not so good at it so i need a very good coder! The coder will get Owner status on the server. The coder will need to know how to make commands such as ::giveadmin, ::demote, ::staffmeeting and so on. You will also need to know how to make pk zones and safe zones. I may be making a forums and webclient to so you will need to know how to do that. You will also need to know how to change objects like excaliber into ags for people who dont have client! I will need a good, experienced coder! Just respond here or pm me! THX!

item.title: Need coder!
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:5, topic:319365”][quote author=kneistol link=topic=415826.msg3059261#msg3059261 date=1260734573]
i know all that stuff but i won’t be your coder
becuz you arent allowed to ask
cmon get ya out off the sofa and start working on your own
a good place to start coding is in the tut section
and if you wonder something add me on msn at kneistol@online.no
and ask but i still won’t be your coder
WORK YOUROWN
[/quote]

You don’t know how to program anyway.[/quote]

yeah i know what he did ask about like how to make wildzones and safezones and commands and make glitches (some off them) go away

Read full topic

item.description:
@getting_icy wrote:

I am currently making my first server. I am not so good at it so i need a very good coder! The coder will get Owner status on the server. The coder will need to know how to make commands such as ::giveadmin, ::demote, ::staffmeeting and so on. You will also need to know how to make pk zones and safe zones. I may be making a forums and webclient to so you will need to know how to do that. You will also need to know how to change objects like excaliber into ags for people who dont have client! THX!
